edu.spa.ftclib.internal.controller

Class PController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.spa.ftclib.internal.controller.ControlAlgorithm
      • edu.spa.ftclib.internal.controller.PIDController
        • edu.spa.ftclib.internal.controller.PController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller, DerivativeAlgorithm, Targetable, TargetableAlgorithm

    public class PController
extends PIDController
    Created by Gabriel on 2017-12-28. A proportional controller. It sets KI and KD to zero, so that one only needs to worry about the proportional part.

        public PController(double KP)
        The constructor for the controller. Creates a PID controller with KD=KI=0.
